job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-03T01:25:04.000Z", "description": "A Software Development company that develops mobile threat defense software solutions is looking to bring on a talented Site Reliability Engineer. You'd be joining their Dallas-based team of unique problem solvers with a multitude of skills and perspectives.

As an SRE, you'll be focused primarily on running better production application and systems, creating a strict engineering discipline, and utilizing software and systems to help find creative engineering solutions to operational problems.

Skills & Experience
  • 4+ years of experience in a DevOps/SRE environment
  • Azure DevOps
  • Experience working in both Azure and AWS environments is highly preferred
  • Proficient in Java and/or Powershell scripting
  • Working knowledge of Terraform and Ansible
  • Docker/Kubernetes


The Offer
  • Competitive Salary: Up to $155K/year, DOE


You Will Receive The Following Benefits
  • Medical, Dental, Vision
  • 401(k)
  • Casual work environment
  • Full remote work option

Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a full-time basis now and in the future.

Posted By: Carolyn Regimbal
